mapper.insert: insert into stock_my_selected_type (id, type, name, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select from stock_my_selected_type order by id asc
